EmailTemplate.description: Added after go-live to differentiate from First Defect Notice
EmailTemplate.name: Follow-up Defect Notice EWP NINTEX
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-Up Defect Notice: Permit Application# {!Rejection__c.Registration_Number__c} for {!Rejection__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Permit application for {!Rejection__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} has been reviewed and defected again for not meeting all of the application requirements. Please review the attached Follow-up Defect Notice included in this email, which lists each specific defect in your application.
You must use the Google Chrome browser to make the necessary corrections. Safari, Firefox or any other browser will not work. To log in and make changes, please visit https://cadir.my.site.com/registrations.
Please follow the steps below:
Log in to your dashboard and click update under the license number. Provide the requested information. Go to the "Submission" section. Select "Yes" to the question "Resubmit Application due to Pending Defect". Click <Submit>.
If you submitted a paper application, please resubmit by mail to the address in the attached notice.
Sincerely,
Entertainment Work Permit Unit Labor Commissioner's Office Department of Industrial Relations State of California Phone: (818) 901-5484
